_source.text: 1. you are right that guys like monfils and verdasco are better athletes - the only problem they can't play tennis 2. say a lot of people who miss all court tennis not just baseline bashing 3. it's been discussed many times that on slower courts it does look like the defence is better today but would love to see the same defenders/retrievers on the fast courts like the one in 1996 masters final

text: 1. you are right that guys like monfils and verdasco are better athletes - the only problem they can't play tennis 2. say a lot of people who miss all court tennis not just baseline bashing 3. it's been discussed many times that on slower courts it does look like the defence **is** **better** today but would love to see the same defenders/retrievers on the fast courts like the one in **1996** **masters** final
